channel.title: ANIMA | Daily Muse

item.title: Edition 2026-01-14: Spiritual/Deep
item.description:
Todays Mood: Spiritual/Deep

Inspired by: A quiet day of reflection and meditation across the globe

Cinema: Mirror (Andrei Tarkovsky, 1975)
""Words can't express a person's whole vividness.""

Music: Sounds of India (Ravi Shankar, 1968)

Literature: 100 Years of Solitude (G.G. Márquez, 1967)

item.title: Edition 2026-01-14: Tech/Future
item.description:
Todays Mood: Tech/Future

Inspired by: Massive AI breakthrough changes how we write code

Cinema: 2001: A Space Odyssey (Stanley Kubrick, 1968)
""I'm sorry, Dave. I'm afraid I can't do that.""

Music: Homogenic (Björk, 1997)

Literature: The Road (Cormac McCarthy, 2006)
